name: Urgegas
0:
”Alexa, open urge gas”
”Give me my propane tank level”
”Tell me my propane tank list”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: urge gas
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Urgegas is a solution that provides the level of your propane tanks, both horizontal and vertical.
Urgegas requires a device that you purchase on www.urgegas.com. Once you have the device, download the urgegas mobile app from the Apple Store, or Google Play Store.
First, you must create an account in the urgegas mobile application. Use the same email address as your Alexa account. Alexa will use this email address to find your urgegas account and locate your device on your propane tank.
Add your device in your urgegas mobile application, just follow the instructions in the app.
Once your device has been added, please open the Alexa mobile application, in the menu go to skill & games, search for the urgegas skill. 
Activate your urgegas skill to use it. You might be prompted to enter your Alexa account credentials. Just click allow. You will see a message that says "Your Urgegas account has been successfully linked." 
This urgegas skill uses your Alexa account profile to connect with the urgegas mobile application and obtain the levels of your propane tanks. If you do not do the account linking, this skill will not be able to access your urgegas account.
At this point you can go to Alexa and say: Alexa, Open Urge gas. Alexa will give you instructions on how you can start receiving information about your LPG tank levels.
